name: Cleverboxes - Asus VK278Q 27 inch LCD Monitor 300cd/m2 10,000,000:1 1920x1080 DBI HDMI VGA (Black)
certifications: Energy Star, UL/cUL, CB, CE, EuP, FCC, CCC, BSMI, Gost-R, C-Tick, VCCI, PSB, EK, J-MOSS, Taiwan Green Mark, RoHS, WEEE, Windows 7 & Vista WHQL
description: VK278Q leads you to enter a big and spectacular world of colours with Full HD 1080p (1920x1080) support and HDMI port. AI Light function enables the VK278Q automatically adjusting to lower brightness and make your eyes feel more comfortable in the dim environment. Furthermore, it helps save more 25% power consumption. Embedded digital HDMI and DisplayPort inputs, VK278Q enables the most advanced graphic cards/ computers connection. The DisplayPort interface also offers better support of multiple display streams, longer cable connection, and interoperability with other inputs, such as VGA, DVI and HDMI.
